item.title: Jenne add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "I have never listened to anyone who criticized my taste in space travel, sideshows or gorillas. When this occurs, I pack up my dinosaurs and leave the room." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Jenne add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description:
"This wasn't just plain terrible, this was fancy terrible. This was terrible with raisins in it."
[<i>Women Know Everything!</i>]" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Jenne add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "This is not a novel to be tossed aside lightly. It should be thrown with great force." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Jenne add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jenne add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I'm not going to wear a red dress," she said. "It would look stunning, My Lady," she called. She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Jenne add a quote by Susan Beth Pfeffer
Jenne add a quote by Nick Harkaway
item.description: "That's probably why she has added the two severed heads to the uprights of the throne. They lend her an undeniable air of not screwing around." -- Nick Harkaway

item.title: Jenne add a quote by Sharon Creech
item.description: "Then I thought, boy, isn't that just typical? You wait and wait and wait for something, and then when it happens, you feel sad." -- Sharon Creech
